title: Reservator
description: A real-time reservation management system for businesses, allowing users to book, modify, and cancel appointments. Features include user authentication, availability tracking, and admin control panel.

title: Funbytes
description: An introductory computer science book for kids, making complex concepts accessible and fun through engaging stories and interactive examples.

title: Portfolio Page
description: A full portfolio page built with Vanilla JS, HTML, and CSS. Fully responsive and includes sections for contact, skills, and projects.

title: Pomodoro Timer
description: A minimalist Pomodoro timer to help you focus. Customize work and break durations. Built with Vanilla JS, HTML, and CSS.

title: Interactive Card Detail Page
description: A responsive web component that displays product or content cards with interactive hover effects and expandable detail views. Designed for use in dashboards, e-commerce pages, or content previews.
